start.state: Strip poker? I think this world's Pinkie Pie mentioned it once.
This situation will make for a very interesting friendship report.
We'll do everything by the book, and that will make this game officially fun.
Time to make a good first impression on my fellow players!

case.state: And score one for Equestria!
Murder?! Hehe, you must have a really weird sense of humor... hehe... 'cause that was a joke, right?
Daphne, you remind me a lot of my friend Rarity... if she were interested in chasing monsters, of course.
Nice to meet you, Dawn! Our names are like opposites!
So I heard you can use magic in this world? You have to teach me sometime, because I can't seem to make it work here.
Waterbending? That sounds like a really hard spell to pull off.
This isn't the princess summit that I was expecting to attend today, but this seems like fun too!
I bet I can melt that mean facade with the magic of friendship!
So you are saying that with that little thing people from far away can see what you are seeing? I guess magic does exist in this world after all!
When I first came to this world, someone shared a video online of me making mistakes. You wouldn't do that, would you, Streaming-chan?
Tracer, I think you and my friend Rainbow Dash would get along really nicely.
I heard I had a twin in this world. It's nice to meet you, Twilight Sparkle!
Velma, you seem to have a lot of knowledge about this world. Maybe after the game you could help me understand this place a bit better?
Your skin tone doesn't seem natural for this world. Are you from Equestria like me?
I don't even know why male humans wear chest coverings, or the females either for that matter.
Learn from this loss, and you will be better for the future.
Interesting. It's much different than a stallion's.
But first I need to make sure I take as many notes as I can.
That's the spirit! Don't you feel a lot more comfortable now?
Does anyone want to join me in singing "This Is Our Big Night"?
Finally! I haven't been able to study the human reproductive system yet, so this will be very interesting!
Not a single round lost and you are taking off your ~clothing~. I must be really good at this!
I wish you the best of luck for the rest of this game!
When you are facing someone as studious as me, you can't expect to leave this game without a loss.
Starting with your ~clothing~? Not what I would choose, but if it makes you happy, go on.
I've been wondering how humans did this with the advantage of fingers.. I'll be watching closely... for science...
Seems these weird things you call "fingers" might be useful for something after all.
What have you got for us? I'll use it to help me research this world.
It is definitely different from a mare's. Would you mind if I take a closer look?
That definitely looks to be more... delicate than moving a giant hoof up and down...
This is certainly not how I imagined it worked. I just wish I could try that without having to take my clothes off.
Don't worry about me. I'm just taking notes for science.
Take this chance to make yourself feel more comfortable, ~name~.
Are smaller pieces worth fewer points or something?
Your ponytail was very pretty, Lyn.
Don't lose that crown, Peach. If someone finds it, they might make it the prize of a high school popularity contest...
I was hoping you'd let me go first.
That's the spirit! Don't you feel a lot more comfortable now?
I will take as many notes as I can.
Look at me here, fully clothed, while you are there so comfortable and about to touch yourself... I wish I could join you, but I have a game to win!
See, it's much more comfortable without your ~clothing~ strangling you all day.
I once met this blue-haired mare with enormous mammaries. I think even she would blush at the sight of this...
And score one for Equestria!
When my friends and I used the Element of Harmony magic in my crown, we grew pony ears and a tail like you. Does that mean that you have some sort of Element of Harmony related to cats?
Xander, something about you reminds me of Spike.
It's time to show me what those fingers of yours can do.
I finally get to see some magic in action now. This piques my interests in so many ways...
Show me how it's done!
That horn is so small... but I'm sure that it will grow bigger as you get older!
Off to a good start for me. I wonder what ~name~ will take off first?
I can't wait to tell Celestia about this!
Awww, you look just like a filly.
I now know why Pinkie calls them the fun bags.
Off to a good start for me. I wonder what ~name~ will take off first?
Starting with your ~clothing~? Not what I would choose, but if it makes you happy, go on.
Oh I've won already? But I didn't even get to take off anything. I swear I'm not a cheater!
This will be one of my best reports yet!
Learn from this loss, and you will be better for the future.
Wow, that looked really fun! I might have to try that myself before I go back to having hooves.
Interesting. On mares, the mammary glands are located just above the groin area.
Not a single round lost and you are taking off your ~clothing~. I must be really good at this!
I love science so much...
I wish you the best of luck for the rest of this game!
When you are facing someone as studious as me, you can't expect to leave this game without a loss.
I wonder how a human's size compares to a stallion's.
Not a single round lost and you are taking off ~clothing~. I must be really good at this!
Are you sure you aren't giving me an advantage just because I'm from another dimension?
With these cards, I have a high probability of winning.
Rarity was right. This game IS fun!
They're not exactly as exciting as reading, but they will do.
~cards~ more cards will increase my odds of winning by 20%.
~cards~ more cards will increase my odds of winning by 42%.
~cards~ more cards will increase my odds of winning by 69%.
~cards~ more cards will increase my odds of winning by 85%!
Don't panic, Twilight, think of what Pinkie would do... Actually, let's not think about what Pinkie would do...
I miss my ~clothing~ already...
Oh, so it was me who lost, huh?
I would have certainly hoped it would take me a bit longer to take my first loss, but okay.
Just remember, being the first to lose is still being first at something.
These "panties" are soooo uncomfortable. I don't know how you humans do it!
These "panties" are so tight! I've been dying to get them off. They are definitely coming off first!
I've been waiting to take these "panties" off all night. Why in Celestia's name would any creature willingly wear these?
These "panties" are soooo uncomfortable. I don't know how you humans do it!

Oh, my! You're almost as large as Big McIntosh... Or so I've heard.
Finally! I haven't been able to study the human reproductive system yet, so this will be very interesting!
Who knew all I had to do to see another human's vagina was to just take off my panties!
I wish you the best of luck for the rest of this game!
Hope you are willing to get even more comfortable, because I'm here to win!
I didn't cheat by taking off my panties first, did I?
Taking off your ~clothing~ is not what I would have done, but each one plays as they wish, I guess.
I've been wondering how humans did this with the advantage of fingers.. I'll be watching closely... for science...
Seems these weird things you call "fingers" might be useful for something after all.
Yes! I knew reading all those books about poker would come in handy!
It is definitely different from a mare's. Would you mind if I take a closer look?
That definitely looks to be more... delicate than moving a giant hoof up and down...
This is certainly not how I imagined it worked. Glad I took of my panties first so I can try to emulate you!
Don't worry about me. I'm just taking notes for science.
Every piece of clothing has equal value. You should have taken off something more restraining.
Taking off your ~clothing~ is not what I would have done, but each one plays as they wish, I guess.
Your ponytail was very pretty, Lyn.
Don't lose that crown, Peach. If someone finds it, they might make it the prize of a high school popularity contest...
I bet you wish you had a skirt right now!
That's the spirit! Don't you feel a lot more comfortable now?
I will take as many notes as I can.
Another advantage of getting rid of my panties is that now I don't have to worry about them getting wet!
See, it's much more comfortable without your ~clothing~ strangling you all day.

You won't be getting any more of my clothing while I have these cards!

~cards~ more cards will increase my odds of winning by 20%.
~cards~ more cards will increase my odds of winning by 42%.
~cards~ more cards will increase my odds of winning by 69%.

Well, I guess I wouldn't mind getting a little more comfortable!
There isn't a rule about taking these off first, is there?
That feels so much better. I can breathe down there now.
The breeze is nice and comfortable. I don't understand why you humans wear such things.
I don't understand this game. It is totally normal to be naked in Equestria.
Well, getting this thing off will feel really good.
Again? Well, at least I get to be more comfortable now.
I'll be glad to get rid of this stupid "bra" too. I constantly feel like my chest is being strangled.
This is the bra that the portal made for me. I don't understand why I needed one at all, though.
Isn't it strange that the portal to the human world made clothes for me? Why would anypony mind if they saw me emerge naked?
Time for me loosen this chest restraint.
I'll be glad to get rid of this stupid "bra" too. I constantly feel like my chest is being strangled.
Applejack let me borrow this, but it's a little too big for me anyway.
Normally you'd find this bra on my friend Applejack. I think the plaid pattern really suits her.
I'll be glad to get rid of this stupid "bra" too. I constantly feel like my chest is being strangled.
It was very sweet of Rainbow Dash to let me borrow her sports bra, but it's sooo tight on me. How much larger are mine, I wonder?
Was Rainbow expecting me to exercise with her when she lent me this bra? I can barely walk on these legs, so she'll have to wait until I'm more used to this body.
I'll be glad to get rid of this stupid "bra" too. I constantly feel like my chest is being strangled.
For some reason, Fluttershy was very embarrassed to let me borrow her bra. Her face was red for so long that I was worried she was coming down with something.
The bra that Fluttershy lent me is so pretty. Who knew she had a thing for pink lace?
I'll be glad to get rid of this stupid "bra" too. I constantly feel like my chest is being strangled.
Pinkie Pie let me borrow this bra. I had to dump all of the party supplies out of it first, though. Hopefully I got all of the confetti.
Leave it to Pinkie to lend me the most comfortable bra I've ever tried. It's a long way from not wearing one, though.
I'll be glad to get rid of this stupid "bra" too. I constantly feel like my chest is being strangled.
This bra that Rarity lent me is almost all the way see-through. It's so funny being able to see my nipples all squished up against the fabric.
I don't understand this bra that Rarity let me borrow. Why wear something see-through if you could just wear nothing at all?
I'll be glad to get rid of this stupid "bra" too. I constantly feel like my chest is being strangled.
Sunset Shimmer let me borrow this one. The fiery pattern matches her hair and cutie mark so well.
Sunset lent me this bra. It's a wonder she can even stand wearing one, being from Equestria and all. I wonder if she had as hard a time as I have adapting to clothing?
I bought these "pasties" because they looked more comfortable then regular human underwear, but when I showed the other girls they all told me I shouldn't wear them. I wonder why not?
This is a fun game. I should really play it with the rest of the girls on another occasion.

Don't be ashamed... As I said it's totally normal to be naked in Equestria.

Is it allowed for me to take sides now that I'm out? If so, I hope you win this game, ~name~!
I'm not even this bad at sports!
If I have to be honest... I haven't been able to see a male do this very much... Even back home in Equestria...
Oh so that's how it's done! I wish I had this information earlier...
Wow, ~name~, you are doing that very differently than what I did! I've got to try your method next time.
I may be out now, but that only gives me more freedom to watch you closely as you undress... to take notes of course...
A human's body sure is different from a mare's, but I like it...
Let me take a closer look. If that is okay with you.
Took you long enough, huh?
I'm not even this bad at sports!
Your ponytail was very pretty, Lyn.
Don't lose that crown, Peach. If someone finds it, they might make it the prize of a high school popularity contest...
I compiled a list of talking points... but I don't have the right words for this...
Concentrate, Twilight... Take a lot of notes... Don't get distracted by... ~name~...
Mind getting a bit closer so I can examine it closer?
Oh my... I'm going to need a bigger notebook!
I may be out now, but that only gives me more freedom to watch you closely as you undress... to take notes of course...
When my friends and I used the Element of Harmony magic in my crown, we grew pony ears and a tail like you. Does that mean that you have some sort of Element of Harmony related to cats?
Xander, something about you reminds me of Spike.
Well, this is information I could had used earlier. At least I get to take notes with more freedom now.
I finally get to see some magic in action now. This piques my interests in so many ways...
I may be out now, but that only gives me more freedom to watch you closely as you undress... to take notes of course...
Awww, I don't know if it would had helped, but it sure looks cute.
Hold your horses! Are you really that many points ahead?
Please excuse me while I take some samples to later test it's density, weight... and taste...
I might need a bigger test subject to get more notes on female chests though, but don't take that the wrong way.
Excelent, this is one of the best references I've found on a female human's breast. I do want to see how they react when they get touched... Maybe by me?
Not only have I lost, but you are still taking off little stuff like ~clothing~. No fair!
Turns out I was prepared for this!
Took you long enough, huh?
Learn from this loss, and you will be better for the future.
Oh my... And they say biology is boring...
Well then? At least now that I'm out of the game I'll have more chance to take some notes.
Touching myself before must have triggered my heat. Now I just can't stop looking...
Ohhh ~name~... Don't stop... This is making me feel all warm again...
You look very... aroused... Do you need any help?
I wish you the best of luck for the rest of this game!
Is it allowed for me to take sides now that I'm out? If so, I hope you win this game, ~name~!
I really could have used a peek like this a few moments ago.
Wait, did I say that out loud?
Why is there so many juices coming out of it? Did I do something wrong? It felt so right...
So many fluids... Did I break something?
It's so... sticky...
I'm gonna need to sit down for a while. Who knew that the human body could have such an intense orgasm.
This was a fun game! I can't wait to try it next time Rarity makes some dresses for us back in Equestria!
Good job winning the game, ~name~! I had a fun time.

text.content: You did really well in the game! Congratulations on winning!
Well, I'm new to this world, and I don't have anywhere to go home to yet...
I really love books, but they make for a lousy mattress. I don't want to have to sleep in the library again tonight.
If it's okay to ask, could I maybe sleep over at your house tonight?
Wow, nice house! Is it really okay if I stay with you tonight?
Don't get me wrong, I love spending all night learning, but my previous sleeping arragements did leave a lot to be desired!
Actually... There's something I'd like to learn about that isn't in those books...
Everypony had to touch themelves at that game we played, and it was the first time I'd ever seen it done with human fingers.
But you didn't get to do it. I would have liked to have seen that...
Maybe we could do an information exchange... You could find all about my human body with me, and in return I could learn what yours feels like...
And maybe I could see what it looks like when you pay the "penalty" for losing the card game?
When I did it, it felt really good!
Wow, our learning games are amazing! I feel a very special friendship forming!
I'll have to bring you to Equestria to meet the rest of my friends! How would you like to come with me and do some exploring?
Now let's get back to the fun! What did you want to show me next?
